description: Try our easy to follow Mini Apple Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Apple Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to tray and bake for 25 minutes or until puffed and golden. Glaze with jam while warm.
